message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you our premium product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. As we're just starting our conversation, I'd like to make an opening offer of $12,000. This is a competitive price considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your business.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $12,000 is a little steep for me. Would you be willing to come down to $10,000?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that $12,000 might be a bit high for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to lower the price to $11,500. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, considering the product's value and the benefits it can bring to your business.
I appreciate you moving closer to my budget, Alice.  How about we settle at $10,750?  I think that's a fair price for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $10,750, but I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to lower the price to $11,200. This is my final offer, as I'm not willing to go any lower.
Alice, I understand you're firm on your price, but I'm on a tight budget.  I can do $11,000 - it's a fair offer and I'm ready to close the deal today if you accept.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as high as $11,000, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to lower the price to $11,100. This is my last offer, as I'm not willing to go any lower.
